title: As U.S. Bombs Tehran, Some Iranians Feel Abandoned by Their Leaders
summary_full: The government provided little advice in the days before the attacks or as the bombs fell, more than a dozen Iranians said in interviews.
summary_public: The government provided little advice in the days before the attacks or as the bombs fell, more than a dozen Iranians said in interviews.

IR.label: negative
